thread.title: Thomas Obrey
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Thomas Obrey

author: Thomas Obrey
title: Thomas Obrey
text: I am totally pleased with the service I have received from LTB. I would highly recommend them to all my friends. Taylor, who handled my problem was extremely courteous and very pleasant and easy to deal with. His response was very quick and he resolved my problem promptly. Keep up the good work Taylor.
